definitions.title: du.
definitions.body: [[רֵחַיִם]] (hand-)mill (prob. = two mill-stones);—´[[ר]]: abs., common household utensil, turned by maids, Ex 11:5 ([[הָרֵחָָיִלם]]; J), female slaves Is 47:1 (c. [[טָחַן]], q.v.); ´[[טָחַן בָּר]]: Nu 11:8 (J); [[וׇרָָכֶב]] ´[[ר]]: De 24:6 (v. [[רכב]]); ´[[קוֹל ר]]: as sound of family life Je 25:10.
